title: Ed Weber - Wikipedia
snippet: Edward Ford Weber (July 26, 1931 – February 27, 2023) was an American lawyer, military veteran and politician from Ohio. He served one term in the United States House of Representatives as a Republican from 1981 to 1983. Weber was born in Toledo, Ohio. He earned a Bachelor of Arts degree ...

title: Ed Weber | MLB Executives | About MLB | Official Information | MLB.com
snippet: Weber received a Bachelor of Science degree in Accounting from the Pennsylvania State University in 1992, graduating with honors, and serves as a member of the external advisory board for Penn State’s Schreyer Honors College, which he attended.
